full_summary:
# Long-Term Cloud Services Requirement

## Tender Overview

The Government of Canada has issued a request for proposal for long-term cloud services for Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC). Shared Services Canada (SSC) is responsible for procuring these services and invites qualified vendors to participate in the procurement process.

## Key Dates

- **Tender Closing Date**: May 15, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
- **Q&A Closing Date**: March 27, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
- **Pre-bid Compliance Check Process Closing Date**: May 1, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

## Procurement Process

The procurement process consists of two phases:

1.  **Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)**: This is the first phase of the procurement process, where vendors are invited to pre-qualify in accordance with the terms and conditions of this ITQ. Qualified Respondents will be permitted to bid on any subsequent solicitations issued as part of the procurement process.
2.  **Solicitation Phase**: Only Qualified Respondents will be invited to participate in the Solicitation Phase.

## Scope of Procurement

ESDC requires cloud services that can meet the following requirements:

-   High availability and scalability
-   Disaster recovery capabilities
-   Business continuity
-   Predictable costs

## Award

Two (2) contracts are anticipated, with an initial duration of 10 (ten) years, followed by additional option periods.

## Important Notes

-   SSC reserves the right to use an alternative approach at the solicitation phase.
-   The procurement process is subject to the Canada Source Selection criteria and procedures.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

-   **Enterprise IT Procurement - Cloud Services**
    -   Email: [pvrprotectedcloudarfnuageprotege@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:pvrprotectedcloudarfnuageprotege@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
